title: present DOWNLOAD FREE TRIAL action button for store apps that have free trials
body:
I have an app listed on the store here
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/deskrule-desktop-search-engine/9nblggh43z1v
it is declared as "free to try" but prospective users just see a big BUY button, and to get the free trial they have to hunt for the [â€¦] button and its menu. I am sure this limits the # of people willing to try the app!
